type Mutation {
  createAssessment: String

input BenchmarkInput {
  currentSchoolId: ID
  state: String
  subject: String
}

  classTeachers: [createClassInputClassTeacher]
  curriculumArea: String
  gradeOrCourse: String

  schoolId: ID
}

input createClassInputClassTeacher {
  _id: ID
  accesses: [String]
  mainTeacher: Boolean

}

  itemsService: CreateSignRequestInputItemsService
  state: String
}

input CreateSignRequestInputItemsService {
  config: String
  items: [ID]
}

  attemptsNumber: Int

}
